summary: I OWN A HONDA CRV 2002 EX WITH AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION AND ~12,000 MILES.  MY WIFE DRIVES THE CAR AND IT HAS STALLED TWICE WHILE SLOWING DOWN TO TURN IN OUR DRIVE WAY, THE EXACT SPOT.  IT'S HARD TO START AFTERWARDS.   SHE DOES START TO UNDO THE SEAT BELT RIGHT BEFORE THE CAR DIES.  THIS IS NOT REPRODUCIBLE.  THIS IS DANGEROUS AND COULD CAUSE A FATAL ACCIDENT.    *JB
